summary: Makes changes to existing shouts to make them more balanced for PerMa.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=1][heading][/size][b][size=5]Description:[/size][/b][size=1][/heading][/size]
[size=4]This mod modifies existing shouts, making them more balanced for PerMa. OR IT THINKS IT DOES. [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bW7Op86ox9g/]DUN DUN DUN[/url].

The last version that officially supports SkyRe is 2.1, anything newer than that will make certain shouts overpowered and elemental fury useless.

Requires Dawnguard, Dragonborn and all the Unofficial Patches.[/size]

[heading][b][size=5]Installation:[/size][/b][/heading]
1. Uninstall any previous version of Shouts Redragonized
2a. Use NMM or your favorite mod manager or
2b. Extract in your \Skyrim\Data folder.
3. Run Patchus Maximus

[heading][b][size=5]Manual Uninstallation:[/size][/b][/heading]
Delete these files:
\Skyrim\Data\ShoutsReloaded.esp
\Skyrim\Data\scripts\xSRDismayBlocker.pex
\Skyrim\Data\scripts\xSREyesFix.pex
\Skyrim\Data\scripts\xSRInvisEyesFix.pex
\Skyrim\Data\scripts\source\xSRDismayBlocker.psc
\Skyrim\Data\scripts\source\xSREyesFix.psc
\Skyrim\Data\scripts\source\xSRInvisEyesFix.psc

[heading][b][size=5]Changes:[/size][/b][/heading]
[b][color=#c9daf8][size=4]Animal Allegiance[/size][/color][/b]

Duration: [s]30/45/60[/s] ⇒ 15/30/60
Area: 75/150/250 (no changes)
Cooldown: [s]50/60/70[/s] ⇒ 25/45/80
Level cap: [s]20[/s] ⇒ 100

An extremely situational shout, I was almost tempted not to change anything about it. The main goal was to make the first word have a low cooldown so you can shout more frequently.


[b][color=#cc0000][size=4]Aura Whisper[/size][/color][/b]

Duration: [s]10/20/30[/s] ⇒ 3/10/20
Cooldown: [s]30/40/50[/s] ⇒ 9/16/30

Words add duration and lock you out of shouting for more time.


[b][color=#99ffff][size=4]Battle Fury[/size][/color][/b]

Duration: [s]60/120/180[/s] ⇒ 75/75/75
Cooldown: [s]20/30/40[/s] ⇒ 20/25/30


[b][color=#1e84cc][size=4]Become Ethereal[/size][/color][/b]

Duration: [s]8/13/18[/s] ⇒ 3/8/20
Cooldown: [s]20/30/40[/s] ⇒ 15/25/40

One word avoids frequent bursts of damage, two words allow you to reposition and/or regenerate, three words = get out of jail free card.

[color=#1e84cc][size=3][b]Ethereal Spirit[/b][/size][/color] (Meditation on Feim)

Health Regen while Ethereal: [s]25%[/s] ⇒ 400%
Become Ethereal also turns you invisible for 5 seconds.


[b][color=#ffff00][size=4]Bend Will[/size][/color][/b]

No changes.


[b][size=4][color=#cfe2f3]Call Dragon[/color][b][size=4] & [b][color=#674ea7][size=4]S[/size][/color][color=#9900ff][size=4]ummon Durnehviir[/size][/color][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b]

Cooldown: [s]300[/s] ⇒ 240


[b][color=#1e84cc][size=4]Call of Valor[/size][/color][/b]

Cooldown: [s]180[/s] ⇒ 90
Duration: [s]60[/s] ⇒ 90


[b][color=#3d85c6][size=4]Clear Skies[/size][/color][/b]

No changes.


[b][color=#efefef][size=4]Cyclone[/size][/color][/b]

No changes.


[b][color=#3d85c6][size=4]Disarm[/size][/color][/b]

Level Cap: 200
Cooldown: [s]40/45/60[/s] ⇒ 50/40/25


[b][color=#cc0000][size=4]Dismay[/size][/color][/b]

Level Cap: 200
Can't affect the same target more than once
Duration: [s]30[/s] ⇒ 9/17/25
Cooldown: [s]40/45/50[/s] ⇒ 18/34/50


[b][color=#1155cc][size=4][color=#0000FF]D[/color][color=#1309EB]r[/color][color=#2712D7]a[/color][color=#3A1BC4]g[/color][color=#4E24B0]o[/color][color=#622D9C]n [/color][color=#894075]A[/color][color=#9C4962]s[/color][color=#B0524E]p[/color][color=#C45B3A]e[/color][color=#D76427]c[/color][color=#EB6D13]t[/color][/size][/color][/b]

No changes.


[b][color=#99ffff][size=4]Dragonrend[/size][/color][/b]

No changes.


[b][color=#9900ff][size=4]Drain Vitality
[/size][/color][/b]
Now steals stamina, magicka and/or health.
Cooldown: [s]30/60/90[/s] ⇒ 20/30/40


[b][color=#b6b6b6][size=4]Elemental Fury[/size][/color][/b]

Bonus attack speed: [s]30/50/70% (130/150/170% with PerMa)[/s] ⇒ 12/25/40% 
Bonus pure damage: [s]10[/s] ⇒ 0 
Now works with enchanted weapons


[b][size=4][color=#ff7700]Fire Breath[/color][/size][/b]

Damage done during the first second: [s]50/70/90[/s] ⇒ 50/100/170 
Damage done during the next [s]second[/s] [/font]⇒ [font=Trebuchet MS]3 seconds: [s]5/7/9[/s] ⇒ 25/50/85 
Total damage over [s]2[/s][/font][font=Trebuchet MS] [/font]⇒[font=Trebuchet MS] 4 seconds: [s]55/77/99[/s] ⇒ 75/150/255 
Cooldown: [s]30/50/100[/s] ⇒ 30/50/70
Deals vanilla damage when used by NPCs

[b][color=#ff7700][size=3]Dragonborn Flame[/size]

[/color][/b]Wyrms are now invulnerable and move 40% faster

[b][color=#ff7700][size=3]The Fire Within[/size][/color][/b] (Medidaton on Yol)

Also increases Fire Resist by 10%.


[b][size=4][b][size=4][b][color=#6fa8dc]Frost Breath[/color][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b]

Total damage over 5 seconds: [s]50/70/90[/s] ⇒ 80/160/260 
Slow: [s]50%[/s] ⇒ [/font][font=Trebuchet MS]30%
Deals vanilla damage when used by NPCs

[b][b][b][color=#6fa8dc][size=3]Dragonborn Frost[/size]

[/color][/b][/b][/b]Duration now depends on words: [s]15[/s] ⇒ 10/15/20


[b][color=#3d85c6][size=4]Ice Form[/size][/color][/b]

Duration: [s]15/30/60[/s] ⇒ 10/20/40
Cooldown: [s]60/90/120[/s] ⇒ 30/50/70


[b][color=#640AFF][size=4]Kyne's Peace[/size][/color][/b]

Duration: [s]60/120/180[/s] ⇒ 20/30/40
Cooldown: [s]40/50/60[/s] ⇒ 45/70/100
Area: [s]75/150/250[/s] ⇒ 75
Level cap: [s]20[/s] ⇒ 100
Now restores 40/80/140 health and stamina.


[b][color=#9900ff][size=4]Marked for Death[/size][/color][/b]

No longer damages health
Now reduces Magic Resist by 10%/20%/30%
Armor Reduction: [s]25/50/75[/s] ⇒ 100/200/300
Duration: [s]60[/s] ⇒ 25


[b][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Slow Time[/size][/color][/b]

No changes.


[b][color=#640AFF][size=4]Soul Tear[/size][/color][/b]

No changes.


[b][color=#fff2cc][size=4]Storm Call[/size][/color][/b]

Duration: [s]60/120/180[/s] ⇒ 30/60/120
Cooldown: [s]300/480/600[/s] ⇒ 150/240/400


[b][color=#d8d8d8][size=4]Throw Voice[/size][/color][/b]

No changes.


[b][color=#1e84cc][size=4]Unrelenting Force[/size][/color][/b]

FUS: Damage: [s]2[/s] ⇒ 10
RO: Damage: [s]5[/s] ⇒ 30
DAH: Damage: [s]10[/s] ⇒ 50, Cooldown [s]45[/s] ⇒ 30

[b][color=#1e84cc][size=3]Dragonborn Force[/size][/color][/b]

Doubles base damage. 

[b][color=#1e84cc][size=3]Force Without Effort[/size][/color][/b] (Meditation on Fus)

Unchanged.


[b][color=#d9ead3][size=4]Whirlwind Sprint[/size][/color][/b]

Cooldown:  [s]20/25/35[/s] ⇒ 10/15/20


[heading][b][size=5]Recommended mods:[/size][/b][/heading]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51166/?][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Storm Wrath Lightning - Fixed Storm Call[/size][/color][/url][/font][font=Trebuchet MS]

[heading][b][size=5]Final notes[/size][size=4]:[/size][/b][/heading]
If you spot a bug or have questions/suggestions leave a comment. It should be "compatible" with any mod that doesn't mess with any of the above. If you have other mods that do the one closer to the bottom of your load order will prevail over the others.[/font]
author: DevilDuke

files.name: Shouts Reloaded Lite 1.1
files.changelogHtml:
Kyne's Peace AOE is now 250 down from 500
Fixed a bug where some shouts were not working properly

files.name: Shouts Reloaded Lite 1.2
files.changelogHtml: Fire and Frost Breath: damage: 50/100/200 from 50/70/90

files.name: Shouts Reloaded Lite 1.3
files.changelogHtml:
Kyne's Peace:

Area: 75/75/75
Cooldown: 45/70/100
Duration: 10/15/20
Level cap: 100
Now restores 30/60/100 health and stamina

files.name: Shouts Reloaded 2.0
files.changelogHtml:
Renamed to "Shouts Reloaded - designed for SkyRe and PerMa"

Dismay:
Can't affect the same target twice
Targets that are feared are not staggered
Targets that aren't feared are staggered instead
Cooldown: 25/45/70 ⇒ 15/30/45

Kyne's Peace:
Healing can no longer scale with Restoration
Healing: 30/60/100 ⇒ 40/80/140

Fire & Frost Breath:
Now deal vanilla damage to the player when used by NPCs

Frost Breath:
Slow: 50% ⇒ 30%

Marked for Death:
Armor Reduction: 100/160/225 ⇒ 60/100/150

Meditation on Fus:
Incoming stagger reduction: 15% ⇒ 25%

Meditation on Feim:
Regeneration: 200% ⇒ 400%
Added: using Become Ethereal grants 5 seconds of invisibility

Meditation on Yol:
Increases Fire Resistance by 10%.

files.name: Shouts Redragonized 2.1
files.changelogHtml:
Renamed to "Shouts Redragonized"

Become Ethereal:
Cooldown: 13/24/45 ⇒ 15/25/45

Dismay:
Staggers again.

Dragonborn Flame:
Wyrms are now invulnerable and move 40% faster.

Dragonborn Force:
Now doubles base damage.

Dragonborn Frost:
Duration now depends on words: 15 ⇒ 5/10/15

Drain Vitality:
Now steals stamina/magicka/health
Cooldown: 20/30/40

Ice form:
Actually changed to what the description says‎

Marked for Death:
No longer damages health.
Now reduces Magic Resist by 10/20/30%
Armor reduction: 100/200/300
Duration: 25 seconds.

files.name: Shouts Redragonized 2.1 no USKP masters
files.changelogHtml:

files.name: Shouts Redragonized 2.2
files.changelogHtml:
No longer designed for use with SkyRe.
Unofficial Patches aren't masters anymore.

Become Ethereal:
Duration: 3/7/20 ⇒ 3/8/20
Cooldown: 15/25/45 ⇒ 15/25/40

Disarm:
Cooldown: 60/50/35 ⇒ 50/40/25

Dismay:
Duration: 5/10/15 ⇒ 9/17/25
Cooldown: 15/30/45 ⇒ 18/34/50

Dragonborn frost:
Duration: 5/10/15 ⇒ 10/15/20

Elemental Fury:
Bonus attack speed: 30/50/70% (130/150/170% with PerMa) ⇒ 12/25/40%
Bonus pure damage: 10 ⇒ 0
Now works with enchanted weapons

Fire Breath:
Damage done during the first second: 50/100/200 ⇒ 50/100/170
Damage done during the next second ⇒ 3 seconds: 5/10/20 ⇒ 25/50/85
Total damage over 2 ⇒ 4 seconds: 55/110/220 ⇒ 75/150/255

Frost Breath:
Damage done over 5 seconds: 50/100/200 ⇒ 80/160/260

Kyne's Peace:
Duration: 10/15/20 ⇒ 20/30/40
